website_summaries.verdict: This Geiger counter is on the pricey side, but user-friendly features like the external wand make it worth the investment.
pros: Wand makes it easier to take readings
Runs on battery power or electricity
cons: Recalibration is needed every 12 to 24 months

customer_reviews.title: High accuracy and a good range of detection for an alpha, beta, x-ray, gamma detector
customer_reviews.text: I like this instrument. It has a good range of detection especially for a field survey instrument. The unit is compact but the switches on front will make it important to have a good case before it goes into a backpack. I was told by a technician that the saturation point was at its upper limit of 10,000 cpm and that recovery of the tube was nearly instant once removed from the radiation field. Other words, it would not handle high energy nuclear radiation (>1 R/hr).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little larger than I expected. Hard to hold in one hand.
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as advertised, very sensitive to even background radiation. Has a backlight. One thing is it does not click when a particle is detected, it beeps. It is definitely a tonal beep. With headphones it is a click however. Cons would be that it's not rugged. It feels delicate. The switches protrude and I feel like I could break them off if I were to pack it in a bag without a case. There is an option for it to come with slide switches instead on their main site.
customer_reviews.author: Pravvus

customer_reviews.title: A well designed gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty gadget. It can use a 9V battery for portability. The detachable wand is good for really zeroing in on the sample you want to test. It is sensitive to even low levels of radioactivity, such as what one might find in some granite, or an old piece of uranium glass. It has a backlight feature so you can read it in the dark. It makes a beeping noise with each ionization event. This Geiger counter lacks the classical ticking noise, but otherwise this is a great product that can shed light on any nuclear curiosities one my have.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Works fine and as expected except for the beeper(speaker)
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and as expected except for the beeper(speaker). The speaker is such high frequency that my ears can not hear it unless the unit is nearly to my ear. An audible click would have been better. The computer interface requires an older EIA serial connection. I haven't tried it.
customer_reviews.author: DianaF

customer_reviews.title: GCA-07W Geiger Counter
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Super easy to use. Excellent packaging and rapid delivery. I chose not to rate for accuracy because I have no way to calibrate it so this is an unfair question for rating a purchase. I can state that I will be using it over the next few weeks on a project at work and am incredibly impressed with what I see thus far. PS...it also came with a certification of calibration!
customer_reviews.author: Roy Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great product. Went with this model over the less expensive ones because of the Mueller wand. Was not disappointed. Simple and easy to use. Comes with a great manual to get started. Takes a 9V battery, which is not included, but they did provide an AC adapter in the box. Was really surprised at how the documentation went into using the the Data Out port.
customer_reviews.author: Trent T.

customer_reviews.title: It is a great device that is accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like the small size and the Geiger tube pickup seperate from the unit as you can find the location of the piece of radioactive material very accurately. If it was mounted inside the case, you don't know where the Geiger tube is located exactly inside the unit. I live in CO and there are natural rocks here that have radioactivity and this makes them easy to find. Don't forget to purchase the cable if you want to download the readings to a computer to plot activity later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Geiger Counter Unit
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Geiger counter for a while now. It works well and is accurate. It would be nice if it was built a bit tougher, but for my purposes (non-professional) it is tough enough. For those who want to personally monitor the environmental effects from the Fukushima and WIPP (New Mexico) disasters this is a nice unit. It has helped me calm some fears being spread on the Internet and has helped me learn some things that I didn't know about environmental radiation.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Best Counter Available For The Price w/Professional Backup
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic GM counter, already calibrated at the factory according to NIST standards. I have used it to check the calibration of a CDV-700. While I understand that is not NIST certification, it at least confirms that that particular survey meter is accurate enough for my uses for a day I pray never comes I have been searching for a useful and accurate GM counter for a while, and the GCA-07W is the one that fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: DocD

customer_reviews.title: Well built, accurate and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: A very nicely built geiger counter which is simple to use, and based on reading several calibration standards is quite accurate. I had to contact the manufacturer for a better understanding of using it in cps versus cpm mode, and they were very responsive, quick and helpful. The only suggestion I would make is to consider replacing the toggle switches with slide switches which would make it easier to stuff in a briefcase for air travel. But that is a design preference. This is a definite good buy!
customer_reviews.author: R. Griffis

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed and built product
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable and worth the price. Good documentation ans comes with software for graphing.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great right out of the box once I figured out that I needed to put a battery in it. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: sherae

customer_reviews.title: Accurate readings
customer_reviews.text: Nice easy to use device, appears to accurate when tested against a calibrated sample, quality switches on the device ensures long life & dependable operation. I would recommend this as a good buy to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: JAY F.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked for this for Christmas and she absolutely loved it! She is a collector of depression glass and fiestaware and was more than thrilled with the product. Love the way it looks and how it feels in hand. Comfortable and simple! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Science toy + safety/survival tool
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and works easily. Picks up the slight radon alpha particles in my basement. Will be used for basement surveys, and kept in preparedness kit. Bought a rock of uranium ore and kids are fascinated by the clicks it produces. Lightweight unit but performs as described, and features simple operation and displays. Nice manual included, with basics of radioactivity.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great. You need a 9v battery to travel with ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. You need a 9v battery to travel with it, but it comes with a 9v wall adapter so you can fire it up as soon as you open the box.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The best for the price awesome well worth the value 5 stars easily
customer_reviews.text: Awesome professional Geiger counter very sensitive exceeded expectations great buy however treat it gentle like your women should get along great
customer_reviews.author: Lardog 0911

customer_reviews.title: Straightforward to use, easy to integrate with independent data collection hardware
customer_reviews.text: Just does the job right. The looks and styling may be a bit old school, but this only underlines the fact that this is good 'ol engineering, the focus is on quality and functionality, not on bells and whistles. All features are easily accessible from the switches on the front panel. Data interface is clear and well documented. All very solid.
customer_reviews.author: GRZEGORZ P JAKACKI

customer_reviews.title: It would be even better to have it classify the type of particle it ...
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. I tested with a piece of natural uranium. It would be even better to have it classify the type of particle it detected, alpha, beta etc!
customer_reviews.author: Darryn

customer_reviews.title: GCA-07W Geiger counter
customer_reviews.text: The GCA-07W seems to be a solid unit with simple construction. I bought it as a compliment to my SOEKS 01M. This counter is the only one in its price range to have NRC certification capability and has a greater sensitivity at both low and high ranges than other competitors. Also, the external GM tube is a plus and I believe I can upgrade it to a scintillation unit later on to check food more carefully (namely fish caught off my coast). For now though, it's good enough to check things against the normal background radiation, which I've been observing since before Fukashima because of Diablo Canyon's proximity to me.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne B

customer_reviews.title: Curiosity is the spice of life
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Works perfectly. Just a science geek who likes to teach his grandsons science.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kirby

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to use
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and fired it up for the first time. I have never used a geiger counter before and was a little afraid it would be hard to understand. However, I was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to use. It appears to be very well made and the display is easy to read. I was also surprised and pleased that it came with an external power supply. I look forward to using it in the field!
customer_reviews.author: FISHMAN

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had much time to test it, but the counter seems to be in perfect working order. I ordered it with a sample of uranium and the counts matched the labeled radiation. It's very easy to use and comes with free software, a chord to connect it to the computer is not included, however. If I notice anything bad I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. However, the product looked a little delicate. The switches can easily be toggled during transport after I boxed it to keep it safe. I didn't try connecting it to my PC yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had a great experience working with this group and would recommend their services to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kenley

customer_reviews.title: Works, but switches may break in storage
customer_reviews.text: This geiger counter works ok (I have not tried the logging output yet) but I worry that the switches on top may break in storage. I've broken this kind of switch before (the lever arm, not the inside of the switch).
customer_reviews.author: Carla M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well with no issues. Only giving it 4 stars since I just got it. I will revisit this after a while and will update to 5 stars if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Watchout, don't expect professional delivery, even if you pay more...
customer_reviews.text: Everything included as expected, except case screws not included, during calibration, they apparently got distracted and forgot them so the case comes apart frequently till i call and gripe..... incompetence? Air headed, amateurish? Disappointing at the least!
customer_reviews.author: nlpken

customer_reviews.title: GCA-07W
customer_reviews.text: Software CD received is scratched and unusable. It has extremely cheap plastic case. Did not come with battery. No answer when called manufacturer, not able to leave message.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Seagraves

customer_reviews.title: ) Very pleased! I do wish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the paper, aluminum, and lead wand end covers, which allow distinguishing between alpha, beta, and x-ray/ gamma radiations. (By adding additional layers of aluminum or lead of known thicknesses, it should be possible to calculate the mean free path and therefore energy profile of beta, x-ray/gamma emissions with the ultimate goal of identifying the source radioisotope.) Very pleased! I do wish, however, that this instrument included the data display and save options available in the less expensive but alpha-incapable GMC-300E Plus model. Anxious to use this on rock samples from a coming geology field trip.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie L. Pamplin

customer_reviews.title: An excellent instrument for measuring radiation
customer_reviews.text: Excellent instrument for measuring radiation. Sensitive enough to measure background radiation. I have use this to test scrap metal for radioactivity before shipping it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and good product
customer_reviews.text: Prior to buying this product I had bought Uranium Ore Sample and received a 10% coupon, which I then used for my order. I ordered this specific product because this is the only product that I was able to find which detects Alpha, as well as Beta and Gamma Rays. I recently received this product and am hopeful that it will work well for me. It was shipped fast and packaged with care.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This Geiger counter is super easy to use out of the box. I called Images SI for advice before purchasing and they were very helpful. It also arrived earlier than expected. It's a good choice
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, great to do business with. The unit solved our issues, Great Geiger Counter. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Vidrine

customer_reviews.title: Easy and intuitive to use
customer_reviews.text: The GCA-07W is the best Geiger Counter I've come across. Cost is below that of other professional Geiger counters on the market, and has better accuracy. Excellent construction, love the five toggle switch panel controls that makes it easy and intuitive to use.
customer_reviews.author: drc

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I am a complete amateur and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I am a complete amateur and it is simple to understand and use. Also, the company is right there to help and answer any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E. Nappier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GCA-07W Professional Geiger Counter Nuclear Detector works with the Uranium Ore sample I bought to use with it.
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Instrument
customer_reviews.text: The GCA-07W is a great geiger counter. Easy to operate, With instant readings. Easily portable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay I guess....
customer_reviews.text: I didn't purchase this for the Geiger counter, I purchased this for the wand & pc output. Since I have evolved actual magical powers from years of radiation exposure I thought this wand would be perfect for channeling my powers for the greater good. Unfortunately I should have read the title more clearly as the wand wouldn't work with my iMac. I won't return this as the Geiger counter is the perfect height to prop up my dining table. Thanks amazon but I will have to stick with the traditional enchanted stick.
customer_reviews.author: MarkH

product_meta.title: GCA-07W Professional Digital Geiger Counter - Radiation Monitor - with External Wand - NRC Certification Ready- 0.001 mR/hr Resolution - 1000 mR/hr Range
product_meta.description:
The GCA-07W is a handheld personal nuclear radiation detector. A proven track record for detecting nuclear radiation in school physics lab, industrial settings, transport containers, top soil, granite table tops, scrap metal, oil fields, objects and interior spaces.

The external wand makes it easier to search materials and surfaces for radioactivity. The GCA-07W detects Alpha, Beta, X-ray and Gamma radiation above 3 MeV, 50 KeV, and 7 KeV respectively.

Easy to read LCD is a 2 line by 16 characters that provides a current count and radiation level readout. Simple front panel instrument controls make the GCA-07W easy to use. Toggle switches control all the front panel options. User can select a time period, type of measurements (Imperial or Metric). Measurements (counts per second) are converted into radiation levels (mR/hr or mSv/hr). Time selection switch allows Counts Per Second (CPS) or Counts Per Minute (CPM) mode. 

Factory calibrated using a NIST traceable source to ensure accurate measurements. Our NRC certification is available at additional cost from the manufacturer. The NRC certification certifies your Geiger counter has passed ANSI-STD N323A calibration using a NIST traceable source from an independent US licensed laboratory conforming to United States Nuclear Regulatory Commission NRC regulations 10-CFR-34 and 10-CFR-35 standards (available at additional costs through the manufacturer). 

Options: Jack for Headphones or External Speaker. External Power Supply included. 3.5mm Data Port for WIN PC and microcontroller interface. The WIN PC program requires optional 3.5mm to USB data cable. 


Secondary indicators; audio (clicks) and visual (LED) included. 9V battery (mobile operation) not included.
